LLNL/CARE.name: CARE
LLNL/CARE.description: CHAI and RAJA provide an excellent base on which to build portable codes. CARE expands that functionality, adding new features such as loop fusion capability and a portable interface for many numerical algorithms. It provides all the basics for anyone wanting to write portable code.
